word.d: parol, vocabul. ~ FOR ~: parol por parol, textualmen; v. expresser. TO SEND ~ OF: avisar

work.d: n. labor (-ar, -ero, -ator, -atoria, -osi); (lit., mus.) ovre; v. functionar; operar; (take effect) efecter; (exploit) explotar; (mechanism) far functionar, actionar. TO ~ OUT: calcular; elaborar

worm.d: verme; (earth-) lumbric. TAPE~: tenia; (intestinal ~) ascaride; v. (one's way) insinuar se

worry.d: n. tribulation, torment (-ar), truble; v. (~ about.) despitar pri, suciar pri, ínquietar se pri

worse.d: plu mal, pejor. WORSEN: (a)pejorar, demeliorar, far plu mal, agravar

worship.d: n. cultu, adoration; servicie divin; v. adorar

worst.d: max mal, pessim; v. victer, superar WORSTED: fil de lane

worth.d: a. digni de; n. valore, merite; precie. TO BE ~: valer. ~LESS: sin valore

worthy.d: digni, honorabil. TO BE ~ OF: meriter (-osi, -ori) WOULD: (conditional) vell

wrap.d: voluer, velopar. ~ UP: invelopar, inballar; n. (dress) chale

wriggle.d: torder se, serpentear; (crawl) repter. TO ~ OUT OF; extricar se, evader

wrong.d: a. fals, íncorect, errari; mal, ínjust, injuriosi; v. detrimentar, mal tractar, nocer. TO GO ~: errar; n. ínjusticie, male

yesterday.d: yer. YESTERDAY'S NEWSPAPER: li yeral jurnale

yet.d: (already) ja; (still) ancor; (nevertheless) támen. HAS HE COME. ~?: esque il ha ja venit?

yield.d: v. ceder, capitular; conceder; (to temptation) sucumber; n. (return) rendiment, producte

yoke.d: yug; (of oxen) pare; (for carrying pails) vecte

young.d: yun. THE ~: li yunité; (of animals) -ello. WITH ~: gravid

youth.d: yun (-a, -o), júven (-a, -o); (period of life) yunesse; (youngness) yunitá; (young people) li yunite

fellow.d: compane, socio, membre, co-; (individual) chap, homacho
